content: a log-on session with z/VM, an emulator for the IBM 3270 terminal is needed. Many alternatives are available, depending on operating system and platform. Microsoft Windows Many commercial products are available, including the following common products:  Micro Focus Attachmate Extra!  OpenText (formerly Hummingbird) HostExplorer  IBM Personal Communications  Rocket BlueZone/Passport PC to Host  Quick3270  wc3270 (Windows version of c3270, free/libre Open Source software) Apple macOS The following commercial and free options are available:  EmTec ZOC  Mocha TN3270 (available via macOS App Store, free trial version also available)  x3270 suite (x3270, c3270) x3270 is available by building the package from source or a software packaging system, such as MacPorts or Homebrew. You must ensure that XQuartz is installed so that x3270 can run because it is an X11 program. 472 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 Another option on macOS before Catalina (10.15) is the tn3270 X

metadata.title: Virtualization Cookbook for IBM Z Volume 1: IBM z/VM 7.2
